label: 楝
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: The modern term for the China tree (Melia azedarach var. japonica), a relative of the mahogany, is sendan.  It produces pale purple flowers in summer. [栴檀] [Also written 樗]
